database.name: VIEW SIM_LAST_OC_BYPRODUCT_V
database.view: SELECT DISTINCT COALESCE(oi.sim_orderimport_id, '-') || oil.sim_orderimportline_id AS sim_last_oc_byproduct_v_id, oi.ad_client_id, oi.ad_org_id, oi.isactive, oi.updated, oi.updatedby, oi.created, oi.createdby, oil.m_product_id, p.name, oi.sim_orderimport_id, oi.documentno, COALESCE(to_char(date(oi.dateordered)), '--') AS dateordered, oi.c_bpartner_id, (bp.taxid || ' - ') || bp.name AS partnername, oil.qtyordered, oil.priceactual, oil.linenetamt, COALESCE(text(uomtrl.uomsymbol), '--') AS uom, cur.cursymbol, pterm.name AS paymentterm, pmethod.name AS paymentmethod FROM sim_orderimport oi JOIN c_currency cur ON oi.c_currency_id = cur.c_currency_id JOIN c_bpartner bp ON oi.c_bpartner_id = bp.c_bpartner_id JOIN sim_orderimportline oil ON oi.sim_orderimport_id = oil.sim_orderimport_id JOIN m_product p ON oil.m_product_id = p.m_product_id JOIN c_paymentterm pterm ON oi.c_paymentterm_id = pterm.c_paymentterm_id JOIN fin_paymentmethod pmethod ON oi.fin_paymentmethod_id = pmethod.fin_paymentmethod_id JOIN c_uom uom ON oil.c_uom_id = uom.c_uom_id LEFT JOIN c_uom_trl uomtrl ON uom.c_uom_id = uomtrl.c_uom_id
